tv.ux1.entity
Class ContentItem

java.lang.Object
  tv.ux1.entity.Entity
      tv.ux1.entity.ContentItem

public class ContentItem
extends Entity

A ContentItem is an item that is "pushed" from the TV to the controller. It may be an advertisement, or perhaps just a supplemental piece of content. Copyright 2012: ux1.tv

Constant Field Values

IMAGE

public static final java.lang.String IMAGE
An Image of the content item. This should be considered the "main" image of, for example, a product that is for sale.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

SHORT_DESCRIPTION

public static final java.lang.String SHORT_DESCRIPTION
A short description of the item, probably used in a list view summarizing many items.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

LONG_DESCRIPTION

public static final java.lang.String LONG_DESCRIPTION
A long description of the item, probably used in a detail view giving details about a single item.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

TITLE

public static final java.lang.String TITLE
The title of the ContentItem, e.g. the "name" of the item.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

LINK_URL

public static final java.lang.String LINK_URL
The URL that takes you to this item on the web. This may have affiliate tracking parameters in it.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

LINK_TEXT

public static final java.lang.String LINK_TEXT
The text to display for the hyperlink to this item on the web.
